name: Amulet Ace
description: Score a perfect 100% on The Secret of the Amulet! You're Liam's superstar, saving the village!

name: Plains Pathfinder
description: Finish The Secret of the Amulet in under 10 minutes! You're zooming through plains like a speedy hero!

name: Scrapbook Sorcerer
description: Score 90% or higher on Leah's Scrapbook! You're a magical organizer of minerals!

name: Speedy Sorter
description: Finish Leah's Scrapbook before Mom arrives in under 5 minutes! You're a turbo tidier!

name: Hero Historian
description: Score 95% or higher on Hiraya's Heroes! You're a genius at solving hero sequences!

name: Auntie's Ally
description: Complete Hiraya's Heroes 3 times! You're Aunt Marietta's favorite sidekick!

name: Village Victory
description: Improve your score by any amount on any attempt of The Secret of the Amulet! You're Liam's comeback king!

name: Mineral Maestro
description: Get every mineral question right in Leah's Scrapbook! You're a rock star at arranging!

name: Sequence Superstar
description: Perfectly solve the hero sequence in Hiraya's Heroes! You're a timeline wizard!

name: Early Amulet Explorer
description: Finish The Secret of the Amulet in its first week! You're the fastest village saver!

name: Super Story Smasher
description: Blast to a perfect 100% on any story! You're a scoring superhero, tung tung tung sahur!

name: Quest Crusader
description: Complete all 3 stories! You're a brave adventurer conquering every tale!

name: Speedy Story Sprinter
description: Finish any story in under 7 minutes with 80% or more! You're zooming like a silly cheetah!

name: Story Streak Star
description: Score 85% or higher on 2 stories in a row! You're a ninja with a sparkly streak!

name: Bouncy Brainiac
description: Score 90% or higher on any story! Your brain is bouncing with smarts!

name: Retry Rocketeer
description: Boost your score by 15% on any story retry! You're blasting off to better scores!

name: Goofy Zero Guru
description: Score 0% on any story! You're a wacky guru of oopsies, tung tung tung sahur!

name: Turtle Tickler
description: Take over 20 minutes to finish any story! You're a giggling turtle taking your time!

name: Wobbly Wanderer
description: Get a lower score on a retry of any story! You're wandering backward with a goofy grin!

name: Jungle Jumper
description: Complete 5 stories total! You're hopping through the story jungle like a happy frog!
